mapper.select: SELECT /* WamWhereUsedMapper.selectDmnWhereUsedList */ A.* FROM( SELECT 'STWD' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'표준단어' AS OBJ_NM ,B.STWD_ID AS OBJ_ID ,B.STWD_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,B.STWD_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,C.DMN_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,C.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAM_STWD B ON A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DMN C ON A.OBJ_ID = C.DMN_ID WHERE C.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'INFO' AS OBJ_TYPE , '인포타입' AS OBJ_NM , B.INFOTP_ID AS OBJ_ID , B.INFOTP_LNM AS OBJ_LNM , '' AS OBJ_PNM , A.DMN_ID AS OF_DOMAIN , A.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'SDITM' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'표준항목' AS OBJ_NM ,A.SDITM_ID AS OBJ_ID ,A.SDITM_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,A.SDITM_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,A.DMN_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,A.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_SDITM A WHERE A.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'TABLE' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'테이블' AS OBJ_NM ,A.PDM_TBL_ID AS OBJ_ID ,A.PDM_TBL_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,A.PDM_TBL_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,D.DMN_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,D.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON B.SDITM_ID = C.SDITM_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON C.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT WHERE D.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) A

SELECT /* WamWhereUsedMapper.selectStwdWhereUsedList */ MAX(STND_ASRT) STND_ASRT ,MAX(OBJ_TYPE) OBJ_TYPE ,MAX(OBJ_NM) OBJ_NM ,MAX(OBJ_ID) OBJ_ID ,MAX(OBJ_LNM) OBJ_LNM ,MAX(OBJ_PNM) OBJ_PNM ,MAX(OF_DOMAIN) OF_DOMAIN ,MAX(ORD) ORD FROM ( SELECT 'DMN' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'도메인' AS OBJ_NM ,C.DMN_ID AS OBJ_ID ,C.DMN_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,C.DMN_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,B.STWD_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,'2' ORD ,B.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAM_STWD B ON A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DMN C ON A.OBJ_ID = C.DMN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT 'SDITM' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'표준항목' AS OBJ_NM ,C.SDITM_ID AS OBJ_ID ,C.SDITM_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,C.SDITM_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,B.STWD_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,'3' ORD ,B.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAM_STWD B ON A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON A.OBJ_ID = C.SDITM_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'SDITM' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'표준항목' AS OBJ_NM ,D.SDITM_ID AS OBJ_ID ,D.SDITM_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,D.SDITM_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,B.STWD_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,'3' ORD ,B.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN C ON A.OBJ_ID = C.DMN_ID INNER JOIN WAM_STWD B ON A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM D ON C.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'SYMN' AS OBJ_TYPE ,'유사어' AS OBJ_NM ,A.SYMN_ID AS OBJ_ID ,A.SYMN_LNM AS OBJ_LNM ,A.SYMN_PNM AS OBJ_PNM ,B.STWD_ID AS OF_DOMAIN ,'4' ORD ,B.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_SYMN A INNER JOIN WAM_STWD B ON A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) A WHERE A.OF_DOMAIN = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY A.STND_ASRT, A.OBJ_TYPE, A.OBJ_PNM ORDER BY A.ORD,A.OBJ_PNM

SELECT /* WamWhereUsedMapper.selectSditmWhereUsedList */ 'STWD' AS OBJ_TYPE , '표준단어' AS OBJ_NM , C.STWD_ID AS OBJ_ID , C.STWD_LNM AS OBJ_LNM , C.STWD_PNM AS OBJ_PNM , B.SDITM_ID AS OF_DOMAIN , B.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_ID = A.OBJ_ID INNER JOIN WAM_STWD C ON C.STWD_ID = A.STWD_ID WHERE B.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'DMN' AS OBJ_TYPE , '도메인' AS OBJ_NM , C.DMN_ID AS OBJ_ID , C.DMN_LNM AS OBJ_LNM , C.DMN_PNM AS OBJ_PNM , D.SDITM_ID AS OF_DOMAIN , D.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN C INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM D ON D.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND D.DMN_ID = C.DMN_ID WHERE D.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'INFO' AS OBJ_TYPE , '인포타입' AS OBJ_NM , B.INFOTP_ID AS OBJ_ID , B.INFOTP_LNM AS OBJ_LNM , '' AS OBJ_PNM , C.SDITM_ID AS OF_DOMAIN , C.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND B.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT WHERE C.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'TABLE' AS OBJ_TYPE , '테이블' AS OBJ_NM , A.PDM_TBL_ID AS OBJ_ID , A.PDM_TBL_LNM AS OBJ_LNM , A.PDM_TBL_PNM AS OBJ_PNM , C.SDITM_ID AS OF_DOMAIN , C.STND_ASRT AS STND_ASRT FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID WHERE B.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
